Content.Text:
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. Have you had breakfast, 
<MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>Non, non, you must always eat, or you
won't have the strength to work. Please
eat.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. What's wrong?
<PAGE>
Did you want to see me about something?
Hurry, out with it.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good morning. You look so glum.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>You should eat my food. That will cheer
you up. Please eat.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day to you. <MYNAME>, have you eaten
lunch?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>If you haven't, please eat at
my shop. Business is booming.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day to you. It's lunchtime.
<PAGE>
Once lunch is done, I've got to prepare
for dinner. Being a genius chef can be
so tiring.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good day to you. Oh, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
Are you busy with work? I am sooo busy.
There's so much prepping to do.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening to you, <MYNAME>
<PAGE>
It's already sundown. Time for dinner.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. It's getting dark.
<PAGE>
Good children should go home. In my
eyes, you are but a child, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Good evening. It's almost time for bed.
<PAGE>
Eat hearty, then sleep soundly. That's 
the secret to staying healthy.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Spring vegetables are 
delicious around this time.
<PAGE>
Thanks to you, I have some wonderful
ideas for cooking.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. The restaurant is so slow 
when it rains. I can't do business.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME> Summer vegetables are
delicious around this time of year.
I hope you have a big harvest.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>. When it rains, it gets so 
humid and food goes bad.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>! There are so many good 
things to eat in autumn. So please do
your best to grow them.
<PAGE>
Non, non. I am the chef. You, <MYNAME>, 
grow them. I'll be waiting for the
fruits of your labor.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>... The weather is terrible.
The taste of the food will be terribly
affected.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, <MYNAME>! I used snow to create a 
delicious dessert.
<PAGE>
Non, non. I'm not sharing. It's a
present for Felicity.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>! It's snowing so hard, the
customers aren't coming.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>... I can't open the 
restaurant today. The wind is so strong,
no one is coming.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Oh, <MYNAME>... I can't open the 
restaurant today. It's snowing so hard,
no one is coming.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
<MYNAME>, I understand you're seeing 
someone.
<PAGE>
Please come to my restaurant on your 
dates. Dessert will be on the house!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm looking for produce for my 
restaurant. I am a genius chef, after
all, so I am very selective.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>When you crave something delicious
to eat, please come to my place.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There are many things in this forest 
that you won't find in other towns.
<PAGE>
There's nothing more gratifying for a 
chef.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Simmer, grill, deep-fry...you can 
prepare the fish here in all sorts of
different ways. They're sooo tasty.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Sometimes I come to pick mushrooms in 
the forest, and they're all gone. It's
best to come early.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what a pretty lake. There must be 
many tasty bounties in this lake.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Don't you think an outdoor restaurant 
would make money here? I'm going to
think about this.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, this is a magnificent farm. <MYNAME>,
I'm so jealous.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Look at all the homegrown produce. I'd
like to grow them too.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Please grow lots of crops. And I want it
to be high quality. I'm looking forward
to it.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Mining is hard work, isn't it? Please 
make sure you always eat your fill to
keep up your strength!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I want to use precious stones from the 
mine to make the interior of the
restaurant more luxurious.
<PAGE>
Please help me, <MYNAME>! And in return,
lunch is on the house.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A town bursting with nature has high
quality produce, after all. There's a 
freshness you won't find in the city.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's been an increase in people 
lately and business has been picking up.
I still want it to get more lively.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This town is livening up too. Thanks to
that, my restaurant has been busy.
<PAGE>
Please continue to do your best. Let's 
make this town even better.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm so glad I came back to this town.
<PAGE>
There's no town as wonderful as this. 
I'm really grateful.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
<MYNAME>, thank you for building my 
restaurant.
<PAGE>
But I wish it were a bit more fancy... 
Oh no, I'm not complaining.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Every day after the restaurant closes, I
think about recipes.
<PAGE>
I memorize the dishes I make and discard
the recipes, so you may find them
somewhere.
<PAGE>
If you do happen to come across any,
please feel free to use them.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm happiest when I'm cooking. I love
to see my guests happy. That's why
running a restaurant is such a joy.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
I have a daughter named Madeline. She's
about Felicity's age, and she's so cute.
<PAGE>
Non, non. I won't ask her to come to
this town. She works in another town and
has her own life.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
My cooking is second to none. Whatever 
the dish, I can make a better one. What
if I lose, you say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>I never think about such a thing.
You're so silly.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I've trained in cooking in many 
countries and towns. That's why I can
cook anything.
<PAGE>
I've never told a guest I can't cook
something they've requested. That's
something I'm very proud of.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
I'm grateful to you, <MYNAME>. I was 
able to open a restaurant in this
magnificent town.
<PAGE>
I'm going to make this the world's best
restaurant. Please support me.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, basil cheese bread? Did you make 
this, <MYNAME>? It's my favorite. I'm so
pleased!
<PAGE>
I'm going to savor this later. Thank
you.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>, this is a present for me? 
I really love this.
<PAGE>
Mmmhmm, you have fine taste. I commend
you. Thank you.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Hmm, this is a present for me? It's 
something I like, so I'm pleased!
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, I must hand it to you. Thank 
you.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
And what am I supposed to do? I don't
even want it.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>!! Do you understand how upset
I am?!
<PAGE>
I absolutely detest this! I do not want
to see your face today!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mushroom salad? There is nothing in the
world I hate more.
<PAGE>
I'm feeling really ill. Please, don't
ever give this to me again.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a magnificent thing you grew. I
can feel the love you put into growing
it.
<PAGE>
I'm going to prepare it right away.
Thank you very much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! This is magnificent! I've never
seen produce this big! This will be so
great for the restaurant.
<PAGE>
<MYNAME>, thank you very much! I am so
pleased.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Non, non. I have no need of that.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Non, you've already given me something,
so no thanks.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, magnificent! You know it's my
birthday? You are a fine person, <MYNAME>.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>Basil cheese bread! I can't wait to try
it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, it's not as good as mine, but it's
still quite delicious.
<PAGE>
Thank you. I'm very pleased.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! Magnificent. I haven't received a 
present like this before.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>It's quite bold to prepare a dish for
someone like me. Let me give it a taste.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>Hmm, there's no doubt about your taste.
I must commend you.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a birthday present? Thank you,
<MYNAME>. I'm very pleased.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
A birthday present for me... I don't
know what I'd do with something like
that...

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<MYNAME>!! I was so looking forward
to your present, and you give me
something like this!?
<PAGE>
You ruined my birthday! Do you
understand how upset I am?! I don't want
to see your face!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
Mushroom salad? My birthday present is a
mushroom salad?
<PAGE>
What were you thinking, <MYNAME>? I'm
starting to feel ill. Please go away.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, this is magnificent. You can see the
love put into growing it. What a
wonderful birthday present.
<PAGE>
I'm going to prepare it right away. 
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh! How magnificent! I've never seen one
so big! What a wonderful birthday
present.
<PAGE>
Thank you so much, <MYNAME>! I can 
prepare all sorts of dishes with this.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, when she is grown, she will lay
yummy eggs. Please take care of her.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, thank you for the yummy eggs you
always give me. And please continue to
do so.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a big hen! I think she'll lay
lots of eggs. Please take care of her.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a cute, little dog. But I cannot
keep her as a pet at my place. It's a
restaurant, after all.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, an overweight dog. With moderate
amounts of food and moderate exercise,
she could lose some weight.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
What a big, healthy-looking dog. She'd
make a good guard dog for my pantry.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, a big, overweight dog. With moderate
amounts of food and moderate exercise,
she could lose some weight.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a cute cat. Where I previously
l lived, I used to feed leftover food to
cats.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, an overweight cat. With moderate
amounts of food and exercise, she 
could lose some weight.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a fluffy cat. At my restaurant
in the last town I lived in, there were
customers with cats just like this.
<PAGE>
Most of them were wealthy. <MYNAME>,
are you rich?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This overweight cat has such nice fur.
With moderate amounts of food and
exercise, she could lose some weight.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what pretty flowers. I love them. 
I'll display them in my restaurant.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, candy for a child. Hmm, it's quite
good. I'm going to take one for
reference.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh! What a pretty shuttlecock. But what
is it for?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oh, what a pretty ring. But what is it 
for?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, what a cute bird. I'm feeding her
leftover food from the restaurant and 
she's really enjoying it.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, how cute. I want her for my mascot.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
It's just a token from me. Please accept
my birthday present. I'm sure you will
like it, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What's the matter, <MYNAME>? A birthday?
Oh, happy birthday.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Oh, <MYNAME>. Did you want something?
It's been quite a while, hasn't it?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Chez Clement always prepares amazing
foods.
<PAGE>
But we're not responsible if you gain
weight because the food is too good.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Michelle's magic show is very popular.
<PAGE>
I almost wish she'd come every day when
the restaurant is open.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A green bench, how chic. Green is my
favorite color.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A yellow bench, how chic. Yellow is my
second favorite color.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A gold bench, how chic. Gold is such a
luxurious color. And I love luxurious
things.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
A silver bench, how chic. Silver is the
next most luxurious color after gold.
And I love luxurious things.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What large wooden boxes. They're useful
for storing things.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Is there any milk in the milk cans?
<PAGE>
Hmm...just decoration? Then they're not
much use.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A white pot...that's very nice. It's 
such a waste to not display it properly.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a cute wagon. Maybe I could start
selling my food from a wagon?
<PAGE>
...What, no need? Hah hah, I'm only
joking.
<PAGE>
If I did that, sales at my restaurant 
would take a hit.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice table. I wish I had
something like them in my restaurant.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What a nice chair. You'll have to let
me borrow it when I open up a shop on
the beach.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
That's a nice beach parasol table.
You'll have to let me borrow it when I
open up a shop on the beach.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Street lights make it safe at night.
That way I can keep the restaurant open
later.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Street lights make it safe at night.
Plus, when they're stylish, they will
attract more young couple customers.
<PAGE>
<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>That means more business for my
restaurant.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wooden pillars are nice and rustic. But
what is that at the top?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The statue of the woman is beautiful. 
She has a fork, so is she eating
spaghetti?
<PAGE>
Oh, a pike? I-I figured that must be
what it was.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The statue of the woman is beautiful. 
But a pretty woman and a shield don't
really go together.
<PAGE>
A celestial maiden? I see. In essence,
she's the antithesis of the statue with
the pike? Oh, I see...

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a bridge. Is that pool of water
underneath just for the bridge?
<PAGE>
Usually there's a river or lake. Isn't
it kind of strange?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
There's a fire extinguisher. It's
important to be prepared.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Look, a large anchor. That makes for a
very interesting town decoration.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Stone pavements are nice. The scenery is
nice, and it's perfect for a stroll.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area is full of exotic motifs. I
want to take a leisurely stroll since
there's so many unusual things to see.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a strange aura. There are
lots of curious things.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
This area has a strange aura. I'm
starting to feel quite good. Does this
spot have energizing powers or what?

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There's a small garden. It looks nice
and private.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Palm trees are nice. They smell of the
tropics.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
Green flower baskets really bring out
the brilliance of the flowers.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
The yellow basket balances well with the
colors of other flowers.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
The plant has been trimmed so nicely. 
This kind of plant needs lots of care.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Conifers have such fine shapes. They're
green all year long, so you can enjoy
them even in the winter.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A topiary. The round shape is difficult 
to achieve, but this is well done.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's relaxing when there's a hedge. But 
it needs good care or it will dry out.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Lattices make good shields in the 
garden.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Flowers have been planted in a watering
can. It's quite interesting. Such fine
sense of design.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Roses will work for an arbor. I myself
prefer ivy, but it seems there aren't
any here.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Curved arbors look good in a corner or
placed together.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A green fence is gentle on the eyes and
quite nice.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
It's easy to walk when there's a guard
rail.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A wooden wall is simple and nice. I like
it because it feels a little exotic.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A greenhouse is quite convenient. You're
able to enjoy fresh produce all year
long.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a token of my appreciation for
the gift. I'm sure it will make you
happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a token of my appreciation for
the gift. I'm sure it will make you
happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a token of my appreciation for
the gift. I'm sure it will make you
happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a token of my appreciation for
the gift. I'm sure it will make you
happy, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_KAMONBERU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ROUGH>
This is a token of my appreciation for
the gift. I'm sure it will make you
happy, <MYNAME>.
Now's not the time to exchange gifts.
